00032 ModelBasedStatePolicyRef Planner::policy(const StateVectorRef &s)
00033 {
00034   DecisionStateRef ds = policy(m_mdp->state_data(s), NULL);
00035   propagate_changes();
00036   return ds;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void Planner::propagate_changes()
00040 {
00041   // std::cerr << "Planner::propagate_changes with subgoal ";
00042   // m_terminal->debug(std::cerr);
00043 
00044   // Recompute successors for state-actions in inbox and add to
00045   // priority queue.
00046   std::set<DecisionStateWeakRef>::iterator i;
00047   for (i = m_inbox.begin(); i != m_inbox.end(); ++i)
00048     if (!i->expired())
00049       i->lock()->propagate_MDP_change();
00050   m_inbox.clear();
00051   // std::cerr << "Done seeding priority queue\n";
00052 
00053   // Propagate value changes using prioritized sweeping.
00054   while (!m_pqueue.empty()) {
00055     // debug_pqueue(std::cerr);
00056 
00057     const DecisionStateRef ds = m_pqueue.front();
00058     assert(ds);
00059     ds->zero_bound();
00060     ds->propagate_value_change(); // may add more states to pqueue
00061   }
00062   // std::cerr << "Done propagating value changes\n";
00063 
00064   // Send notifications of policy changes.
00065   std::map<DecisionStateWeakRef, TaskRef>::iterator j;
00066   for (j = m_outbox.begin(); j != m_outbox.end(); ++j)
00067     if (!j->first.expired())
00068       j->first.lock()->propagate_policy_change(j->second);
00069   m_outbox.clear();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void Planner::perform_standard_value_iteration()
00073 {
00074   std::cerr << "perform_standard_value_iteration()\n";
00075   NonterminalsContainer::const_iterator i;
00076   double norm_residual;
00077   unsigned counter = 0;
00078   do {
00079     norm_residual = 0;
00080     std::cerr << "\titeration " << ++counter << "\n";
00081     for (i = m_nonterminals.begin(); i != m_nonterminals.end(); ++i) {
00082       if (i->second.expired()) continue;
00083       DecisionStateRef ds(i->second);
00084       double change = ds->backup_values();
00085       if (change < 0)
00086         change = -change;
00087       if (norm_residual < change)
00088         norm_residual = change;
00089     }
00090   } while (norm_residual >= m_epsilon);
00091 }

00102     if (i->second.expired()) continue;
00103     DecisionStateRef ds(i->second);
00104     ds->debug(out);

00107

00117 void Planner::write_value_function(std::ostream &out) const
00118 {
00119   NonterminalsContainer::const_iterator i;
00120   for (i = m_nonterminals.begin(); i != m_nonterminals.end(); ++i) {
00121     if (i->second.expired()) continue;
00122     DecisionStateRef ds(i->second);
00123     out << ds->state() << ds->value() << "\n";
00124   }
00125 }
00126 
00127 void Planner::write_policy(std::ostream &out) const
00128 {
00129   std::map<std::string, std::vector<StateVectorRef> > policy;
00130   NonterminalsContainer::const_iterator i;
00131   for (i = m_nonterminals.begin(); i != m_nonterminals.end(); ++i) {
00132     if (i->second.expired()) continue;
00133     DecisionStateRef ds(i->second);
00134     TaskRef a = ds->policy_action();
00135     const std::string &task_name = a->name();
00136     policy[task_name].push_back(ds->state());
00137   }
00138 
00139   std::map<std::string, std::vector<StateVectorRef> >::const_iterator j;
00140   for (j = policy.begin(); j != policy.end(); ++j) {
00141     const std::string &task_name = j->first;
00142     const std::vector<StateVectorRef> &states = j->second;
00143     // For Gnuplot's convenience, comment out the name of each action
00144     // and leave two blank lines between each action.
00145     out << "# " << task_name << ":\n";
00146     std::vector<StateVectorRef>::const_iterator k;
00147     for (k = states.begin(); k != states.end(); ++k) {
00148       out << *k << "\n";
00149     }
00150     out << "\n\n";
00151   }
00152 }

00171 void Planner::ValueState::add_observer(const ObserverWeakRef &o, double weight)
00172 {
00173   assert(weight >= 0);
00174   vector_map_assoc(m_observers, o, weight);
00175 }
00176 
00177 void Planner::ValueState::remove_observer(const ObserverWeakRef &o)
00178 {
00179   std::vector<std::pair<ObserverWeakRef, double> >::iterator del =
00180     vector_map_find(m_observers, o);
00181   assert(del != m_observers.end());
00182   m_observers.erase(del);
00183 }
00184 
00185 void Planner::ValueState::set_value(double value)
00186 {
00187   const double change = value - m_V;
00188   m_V = value;
00189   std::vector<std::pair<ObserverWeakRef, double> >::const_iterator i;
00190   for (i = m_observers.begin(); i != m_observers.end(); ++i) {
00191     const double w = i->second;
00192     i->first.lock()->observe_value_change(w * change);
00193   }
00194 }

00197 create(const PlannerRef &planner, const MDPStateRef &model,
00198        DecisionStateWeakRef &ref, ValueStateWeakRef *ptr)
00199 {
00200   DecisionStateRef result(new DecisionState(planner, model));
00201   ref = result->m_this = result;
00202   if (ptr)
00203     *ptr = ref;
00204   model->add_observer(result->m_this);
00205   result->initialize();
00206   return result;

00227 
00228 void Planner::DecisionState::initialize()
00229 {
00230 //   std::cout << "DecisionState::initialize() at " << *model->state() << "\n";
00231   const std::vector<std::pair<TaskRef, MDPStateActionRef> > & model_actions =
00232     m_model->state_actions();
00233   std::vector<std::pair<TaskRef, MDPStateActionRef> >::const_iterator a =
00234     model_actions.begin();
00235   std::vector<std::pair<TaskRef, ActionRef> >::iterator b =
00236     m_action_values.begin();
00237   while (a != model_actions.end()) {
00238     assert(b == m_action_values.end() ||
00239            a->first < b->first ||
00240            a->first == b->first);
00241     if (b == m_action_values.end() || a->first < b->first) {
00242       // This can lead to the construction and initialization of other
00243       // DecisionState objects!
00244       b = m_action_values.insert(b, std::make_pair(a->first, ActionRef()));
00245       b->second = Action::create(m_this.lock(), a->second);
00246     }
00247     assert(a->first == b->first);
00248     if (!m_max.second || m_max.second->value() < b->second->value())
00249       m_max = *b;
00250     ++a;
00251     ++b;
00252   }
00253   assert(b == m_action_values.end());
00254   set_value(m_max.second->value());
00255 //   std::cout << "EXIT DecisionState::initialize() at " << *model.state() << "\n";
00256 }

00272 
00273 void Planner::DecisionState::observe_MDP_change(const TaskRef &action)
00274 {
00275   m_inbox.insert(action);
00276   m_planner->m_inbox.insert(m_this);
00277 }
00278 
00279 void Planner::DecisionState::propagate_MDP_change()
00280 {
00281   std::set<TaskRef>::iterator i = m_inbox.begin();
00282   std::vector<std::pair<TaskRef, ActionRef> >::iterator j =
00283     m_action_values.begin();
00284   while (i != m_inbox.end()) {
00285     assert(j != m_action_values.end());
00286     while (j->first < *i) {
00287       ++j;
00288       assert(j != m_action_values.end());
00289     }
00290     assert(j != m_action_values.end() && j->first == *i);
00291     j->second->compute_successors();
00292     ++i;
00293     ++j;
00294   }
00295   m_inbox.clear();
00296   propagate_value_change();
00297 }
00298 
00299 void Planner::DecisionState::propagate_value_change()
00300 {
00301   const std::pair<DecisionStateWeakRef, TaskRef> original(m_this, m_max.first);
00302   std::vector<std::pair<TaskRef, ActionRef> >::iterator i =
00303     m_action_values.begin();
00304   assert(i != m_action_values.end());
00305   i->second->update_value();
00306   m_max = *i;
00307   while (++i != m_action_values.end()) {
00308     i->second->update_value();
00309     if (m_max.second->value() < i->second->value())
00310       m_max = *i;    
00311   }
00312 
00313   if (m_max.first != original.second) // new policy action!
00314     // m_planner->m_outbox is a map, so the insert will have no effect if
00315     // m_this already exists as a key
00316     m_planner->m_outbox.insert(original);
00317 
00318   // std::cerr << "propagate_value_change: Value of " << state()
00319   //        << " (" << m_action_values.size() << " actions): "
00320   //        << value() << " -> " << m_max.second->value() << "\n";
00321   // if (m_max.first != original.second)
00322   //   std::cerr << "\tnew policy action\n";
00323 
00324   if (m_max.second->value() != value())
00325     set_value(m_max.second->value());
00326 }
00327 
00328 void Planner::DecisionState::propagate_policy_change(const TaskRef &original)
00329 {
00330   // The newest policy action may have changed back to the original
00331   // policy action.
00332   if (original != m_max.first)
00333     notify_policy_observers();
00334 }
00335 
00336 void Planner::DecisionState::debug(std::ostream &out) const
00337 {
00338   out << "State " << state() << "\n";
00339   std::vector<std::pair<TaskRef, ActionRef> >::const_iterator i;
00340   for (i = m_action_values.begin(); i != m_action_values.end(); ++i) {
00341     const TaskRef &task = i->first;
00342     const ActionRef &action = i->second;
00343     const PrimitiveTaskRef &prim =
00344       boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<PrimitiveTask, Task>(task);
00345     if (prim)
00346       out << "\tAction " << prim->action() << "\n";
00347     else
00348       out << "\t(Composite)\n";
00349     action->debug(out);
00350   }
00351   out << "\n";
00352 }
00353 
00354 double Planner::DecisionState::backup_values()
00355 {
00356   double oldvalue = value();
00357   const std::pair<DecisionStateWeakRef, TaskRef> original(m_this, m_max.first);
00358   std::vector<std::pair<TaskRef, ActionRef> >::iterator i =
00359     m_action_values.begin();
00360   assert(i != m_action_values.end());
00361   i->second->compute_value();
00362   m_max = *i;
00363   while (++i != m_action_values.end()) {
00364     i->second->compute_value();
00365     if (m_max.second->value() < i->second->value())
00366       m_max = *i;    
00367   }
00368   if (m_max.first != original.second) // new policy action!
00369     // m_planner->m_outbox is a map, so the insert will have no effect
00370     // if m_this already exists as a key
00371     m_planner->m_outbox.insert(original);
00372   if (m_max.second->value() != value())
00373     set_value(m_max.second->value());
00374   return value() - oldvalue;
00375 }

00378 create(const DecisionStateWeakRef &parent, const MDPStateActionRef &model)
00379 {
00380   ActionRef result(new Action(parent, model));
00381   result->m_this = result;
00382   result->compute_successors();
00383   result->compute_value();
00384   return result;
00385 }

00394 Planner::DecisionState::Action::~Action()
00395 {
00396   std::vector<std::pair<StateVectorRef, ValueStateProbability> >::iterator i;
00397   for (i = m_successors.begin(); i != m_successors.end(); ++i) {
00398     const ValueStateRef &successor = i->second.first;
00399     if (successor)
00400       successor->remove_observer(m_this);
00401   }
00402 }
00403 
00404 void Planner::DecisionState::Action::observe_value_change(double change)
00405 {
00406   DecisionStateRef parent(m_parent);
00407   assert(parent);
00408   if (change < 0)
00409     change = -change;
00410   change *= parent->m_planner->m_gamma;
00411   m_errorbound += change;
00412   parent->child_bound(m_this.lock(), m_errorbound);
00413 
00414 //   parent.increase_bound(change);
00415 
00416 //   parent.planner.pqueue.insert(parent.model.state(), change, true);
00417 
00418 
00419 //   Q += change * parent.planner.gamma;
00420 
00421 //   // Difference between this Action object's Q value and the parent
00422 //   // DecisionState object's stored value.  We only bother to change
00423 //   // the parent's stored value if we can beat the stored value or if
00424 //   // the stored value was based on this Action object's Q value and
00425 //   // this value has decreased.
00426 //   double diff = Q - parent.value();
00427 
00428 //   std::cout << "observe_value_change(" << change
00429 //          << ") at " << parent.state() << "\n"
00430 //          << "Q = " << Q
00431 //          << ", diff = " << diff
00432 //          << (this == parent.max.second ? " (policy action)\n" : "\n");
00433 //   if (change > 0)
00434 //     std::cout << "Increase?\n";
00435 //   if (Q > 0) {
00436 //     std::cout << "Positive?!\n";
00437 //     const state_dist_t &model_succs = model.successor_probabilities();
00438 //     state_dist_t::const_iterator a = model_succs.begin();
00439 //     std::vector<std::pair<const state_t *, ValueState *> >::iterator b = successors.begin();
00440 //     double debugQ = 0;
00441 //     while (a != model_succs.end()) {
00442 //       while (b != successors.end() && b->first < a->first) {
00443 //      std::cout << "Extra successor?\n";
00444 //      ++b;
00445 //       }
00446 //       if (b == successors.end() || a->first < b->first)
00447 //      std::cout << "Missing successor?\n";
00448 //       else {
00449 //      std::cout << "\t" << a->second << ": " << b->second->value() << "\n";
00450 //      debugQ += a->second * b->second->value();
00451 //       }
00452 //       ++a;
00453 //       ++b;
00454 //     }
00455 //     debugQ *= parent.planner.gamma;
00456 //     debugQ += model.reward();

00458 //   }
00459

00461 //     diff = -diff; // The value of the policy action decreased!
00462 //   if (diff > parent.planner.epsilon)
00463 //     parent.planner.pqueue.insert(parent.model.state(), diff);

00465 
00466 void Planner::DecisionState::Action::compute_successors()
00467 {
00468   DecisionStateRef parent(m_parent);
00469   assert(parent);
00470 //   std::cout << "compute_successors() at " << parent.state() << "\n";
00471   const StateDistribution &model_succs = m_model->successor_probabilities();
00472   StateDistribution::const_iterator a = model_succs.begin();
00473   std::vector<std::pair<StateVectorRef, ValueStateProbability> >::iterator b =
00474     m_successors.begin();
00475   while (a != model_succs.end()) {
00476     while (b != m_successors.end() && b->first < a->first) {
00477       // Remove erstwhile successor.
00478       const ValueStateRef &vs = b->second.first;
00479       if (vs)
00480         vs->remove_observer(m_this);
00481       b = m_successors.erase(b);
00482     }
00483     if (b == m_successors.end() || a->first < b->first) {
00484       ValueStateRef succ = parent->m_planner->successor_value(a->first);
00485       assert(succ);
00486       succ->add_observer(m_this, a->second);
00487       // Use a NULL reference as a proxy for parent to avoid creating
00488       // a cycle of strong references.
00489       if (succ == parent)
00490         succ.reset();
00491       ValueStateProbability prob(succ, a->second);
00492       b = m_successors.insert(b, std::make_pair(a->first, prob));
00493     } else if (b->second.second != a->second) { // Update existing successor.
00494       const ValueStateRef &vs = b->second.first;
00495       if (vs)
00496         vs->add_observer(m_this, a->second);
00497       else {
00498         ValueState *parent_as_value = parent.get();
00499         parent_as_value->add_observer(m_this, a->second);
00500       }
00501       b->second.second = a->second;
00502     }
00503     ++a;
00504     ++b;
00505   }
00506   while (b != m_successors.end()) {
00507     // Remove erstwhile successor.
00508     const ValueStateRef &vs = b->second.first;
00509     if (vs)
00510       vs->remove_observer(m_this);
00511     else {
00512       ValueState *parent_as_value = parent.get();
00513       parent_as_value->remove_observer(m_this);
00514     }
00515     b = m_successors.erase(b);
00516   }
00517   m_errorbound = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
00518 }
00519 
00520 void Planner::DecisionState::Action::compute_value()
00521 {
00522   DecisionStateRef parent(m_parent);
00523 //   std::cout << "compute_value() at " << parent.state() << "\n";
00524   m_Q = 0.0;
00525   std::vector<std::pair<StateVectorRef, ValueStateProbability> >::iterator b;
00526   for (b = m_successors.begin(); b != m_successors.end(); ++b) {
00527     // We used NULL pointers as a proxy for our parent to avoid strong
00528     // reference cycles.
00529     const ValueStateRef &vs = b->second.first;
00530     const ValueStateRef &successor =  vs ? vs : parent;
00531     const double &successor_probability = b->second.second;
00532     m_Q += successor_probability * successor->value();
00533 
00534 //     std::cout << "\tp = " << b->second.second << ", V = " << b->second.first->value() << ", Q: " << Q << "\n";
00535   }
00536 
00537   m_Q *= parent->m_planner->m_gamma;
00538   m_Q += m_model->reward();
00539   m_errorbound = 0.0;
00540 //   std::cout << "\tQ = " << Q << "\n";
00541 //   if (Q > 0)
00542 //     std::cout << "Positive?!\n";
00543 }
00544 
00545 void Planner::DecisionState::Action::debug(std::ostream &out) const
00546 {  
00547   std::vector<std::pair<StateVectorRef, ValueStateProbability> >::
00548     const_iterator b;
00549   for (b = m_successors.begin(); b != m_successors.end(); ++b) {
00550     const StateVectorRef &s = b->first;
00551     ValueStateRef vs = b->second.first;
00552     if (!vs)
00553       vs = m_parent.lock();
00554     double p = b->second.second;
00555     out << "\t\t" << p << ": " << s << "(" << vs->value() << ")\n";
00556   }
00557   out << "\t\tr = " << m_model->reward() << ", Q = " << value() << "\n";
00558 }
00559 
00560 void Planner::DecisionState::child_bound(const ActionRef &child, double bound)
00561 {
00562   // if not policy action, then discount bound by advantage of the
00563   // policy action
00564   if (child != m_max.second) 
00565     bound -= value() - child->value();
00566   if (m_errorbound < bound) {
00567     m_errorbound = bound; // errorbound increases
00568     if (m_errorbound > m_planner->m_epsilon) {
00569       if (m_heapindex < 0) { // Must insert into priority queue
00570         m_heapindex = static_cast<int>(m_planner->m_pqueue.size());
00571         m_planner->m_pqueue.push_back(m_this.lock());
00572       }
00573       insert_heapify();
00574     }
00575   }
00576 }
00577 
00578 void Planner::DecisionState::heapify()
00579 {
00580   if (m_heapindex >= 0) {
00581     std::vector<DecisionStateRef> &pqueue = m_planner->m_pqueue;
00582     assert(pqueue[m_heapindex] == m_this.lock());
00583     unsigned child_index = 2*m_heapindex + 1; // identify children
00584     while (child_index < pqueue.size()) { // as long as there's a child...
00585       DecisionStateRef *child = &pqueue[child_index];
00586       assert((*child)->m_heapindex == static_cast<int>(child_index));
00587       unsigned other_child_index = child_index + 1;
00588       if (other_child_index < pqueue.size()) {
00589         DecisionStateRef *other_child = &pqueue[other_child_index];
00590         assert((*other_child)->m_heapindex ==
00591                static_cast<int>(other_child_index));
00592         // find the bigger child
00593         if ((*child)->m_errorbound < (*other_child)->m_errorbound) {
00594           child = other_child;
00595           child_index = other_child_index;
00596         }
00597       }
00598       if (m_errorbound < (*child)->m_errorbound) {
00599         // if out errorbound is bigger than child's
00600         child->swap(pqueue[m_heapindex]); // swap entries in pqueue with child
00601         pqueue[m_heapindex]->m_heapindex = m_heapindex; // give child our index
00602         m_heapindex = child_index; // and take the child's index
00603         child_index = 2 * child_index + 1;
00604       } else
00605         break;
00606     }
00607   }
00608 }
00609 
00610 void Planner::DecisionState::insert_heapify()
00611 {
00612   std::vector<DecisionStateRef> &pqueue = m_planner->m_pqueue;
00613   assert(m_heapindex < 0 || pqueue[m_heapindex] == m_this.lock());
00614   while (m_heapindex > 0) {
00615     int parent_index = (m_heapindex - 1)/2;
00616     DecisionStateRef *parent = &pqueue[parent_index];
00617     assert((*parent)->m_heapindex == parent_index);
00618     if (m_errorbound <= (*parent)->m_errorbound)
00619       break;
00620     parent->swap(pqueue[m_heapindex]); // swap spots with parent
00621     pqueue[m_heapindex]->m_heapindex = m_heapindex; // parent takes my index
00622     m_heapindex = parent_index; // I take parent's index
00623   }
00624 }
00625 
00626 void Planner::DecisionState::dequeue()
00627 {
00628   assert(m_heapindex >= 0);
00629   std::vector<DecisionStateRef> &pqueue = m_planner->m_pqueue;
00630   DecisionStateRef *hole = &pqueue[m_heapindex];
00631   hole->swap(pqueue.back()); // swap positions with back
00632   pqueue.pop_back(); // remove back in vector
00633   if (m_heapindex != static_cast<int>(pqueue.size())) {
00634     const DecisionStateRef old_back = *hole;
00635 
00636     // Give the old back element our index
00637     old_back->m_heapindex = m_heapindex;
00638 
00639     // Move old back element toward front if necessary (unlikely)
00640     if (m_heapindex > 0)
00641       old_back->insert_heapify();
00642 
00643     // Move old back toward back if necessary.
00644     old_back->heapify();
00645   }
00646   m_heapindex = -1; // remove this DecisionState from queue
00647 }
00648 
00649 Planner::DecisionStateRef Planner::policy(const MDPStateRef &s,
00650                                           ValueStateWeakRef *ptr)
00651 {
00652   DecisionStateWeakRef &ds = m_nonterminals[s->state()];
00653   if (ds.expired())
00654     return DecisionState::create(m_this.lock(), s, ds, ptr);
00655   else
00656     return ds.lock();
00657 }
00658 
00659 Planner::ValueStateRef Planner::successor_value(const StateVectorRef &successor)
00660 {
00661   ValueStateWeakRef &vs = m_completions[successor];
00662   if (vs.expired()) {
00663     if ((*m_terminal)(successor))
00664       return ValueState::create(vs, (*m_goal)(successor));
00665     else
00666       return policy(m_mdp->state_data(successor), &vs);
00667   } else
00668     return vs.lock();
00669 }
00670 
00671 void Planner::debug_pqueue(std::ostream &out) const
00672 {
00673   out << "Priority queue for task with goal ";
00674   m_terminal->debug(out);
00675   std::vector<DecisionStateRef>::const_iterator i;
00676   for (i = m_pqueue.begin(); i != m_pqueue.end(); ++i) {
00677     DecisionStateRef ds = *i;
00678     out << "\t" << ds->state() << "\n";
00679   }
00680 }
